info.readme:
The Pixlr package makes it possible to edit your images directly in your browser. You can choose between two editors: - Pixlr Editor is a full image editor that comes with a ton of advanced image editing features. - Pixlr Express provides basic editing options through a simple interface.
After installing: After you have installed the package a Pixlr Data Type will be available. To use Pixlr add the new Data Type to an image Media Type. It is recommend that you upload the Pixlr crossdomain.xml file to the root of the website. You activate it under "Developer > Data Types > Pixlr" where you can also read why it is a good idea to use the file.
Before unintalling: Remember to remove the Pixlr Data Type from Media Types before uninstalling.
Changelog: Version 1.1 (12 feb 2010): - Fixed bug that prevented creating new image media types. - Fixed bug that prevented creating new datatypes.
Version 1.0 (11 feb 2010): - First release.
